name: plex-mcp
description: Model Context Protocol server for interacting with Plex Media Server - search, browse, and manage your media library

tools.name: get_library_items
tools.description: Get items from a specific library

tools.name: get_metadata
tools.description: Get detailed metadata for a media item

tools.name: update_media_metadata
tools.description: Update metadata for movies, shows, episodes, audiobooks, etc.

tools.name: mark_as_played
tools.description: Mark a media item as played

tools.name: mark_as_unplayed
tools.description: Mark a media item as unplayed

tools.name: update_play_progress
tools.description: Update playback progress for a media item

tools.name: get_playlist_items
tools.description: Get items from a specific playlist

tools.name: get_server_capabilities
tools.description: Get Plex server information and capabilities

tools.name: refresh_library
tools.description: Refresh a Plex library to scan for new content

user_config.title: Plex Server URL
user_config.description: URL of your Plex Media Server (e.g., http://localhost:32400)

user_config.title: Plex Authentication Token
user_config.description: Your Plex authentication token (found in Plex settings)
